query:
UPDATE
              finalization_data
            SET
              last_finalization_attempt = NOW(),
              failed_finalization_attempts = failed_finalization_attempts + 1
             WHERE withdrawal_id = (
                 SELECT id
                 FROM withdrawals
                 WHERE tx_hash = $1
                 AND event_index_in_tx = $2
                 AND is_primary_chain = $3
             )
